text: [Music]
fixing carriages
[Music]
the lion kin and the lady Zelda once
upon a time there was a rich merchant
living in a large house with his two
daughters named Ariel and son
Zelda was a beautiful and intelligent
girl she really liked natures especially
Birds I have to go on a business trip
what gifts would you like me to bring
back when I return father I want to have
precious gems and diamonds father I want
a lovely Nightingale that can dance and
sing beautifully the father has promised
to bring back the gifts for his little
girls he said goodbye to his children
and set off the father had a successful
business trip and earned a lot of money
he did not forget to buy precious gems
and diamonds for Ariel however he hadn't
found a Nightingale for Zelda yet he had
to go into the forest to search for the
precious bird suddenly he saw a large
and magnificent castle deep in the
forest then he saw a beautiful
nightingale dancing on a treetop in
front of the castle gate the father
decided to climb up the tree to catch
the bird for zelda suddenly he was
startled when he heard a loud roar a
huge lion appeared in front of him he
was really frightened
I suddenly asked him why did you come
here and try to steal my precious third
oh dear sir don't be angry I have a
daughter and she wishes for a
nightingale the father told the lion
about his promise nightingale for his
daughter the lion listened attentively I
really did not know that that precious
bird was yours please let me go
I can give you a lot of gold and silver
I don't need a gold and silver who will
let you go and give this precious bird
as a gift to your daughter if you
promise you will give me the first thing
you see when you return do you agree the
father had to agree with the Lions
condition he was spared by the lion and
was also able to take the precious
nightingale back home for Zelda
along the way he was worried and fought
a lot
oh I have found a precious Nightingale
for Zelda but she was always the first
one to run out and welcome me if that
happens this time
well I have to give her to the lion oh
you know I really wished at this time
the first thing I see would be a dog or
a cat when he arrived home he was still
really stressed about it he just wished
that some animals would welcome him
first but no his good daughter Zelda was
still the first one to run out to see
him father you've returned
oh no the thing I fear the most has
happened father
why do you look so sad don't you want me
to welcome you my dear it's not that I
promised to give the first thing I see
when I come home to a lion
then the old man told his daughter the
story when he was in the forest with the
lion
however after listening the smart and
brave girl was still fearless she told
her father father please do not worry I
will go to the lion and convince him
after that I will come home to you after
that Zelda said goodbye to her father
she took her precious nightingale with
her and bravely went into the forest to
find the lion follow me like a father
told her she went to the castle deep in
the forest returning home the
nightingale was very happy and danced
and sang on her shoulder
Zelda bravely walked into the castle to
find the lion she was surprised to see a
handsome young prince waiting for her in
the castle the Prince kindly introduced
himself
hello I am Prince basil the owner of
this castle also the lion that your
father met your father agreed that you
would marry me will you agree to be my
wife Zelda was surprised to find that
the lion was a handsome young prince she
also fell in love with the gentle prince
and agreed to be Basil's wife because
Prince basil was under a witch's curse
when he was indoors or at night he was
in his human form but whenever he went
out and exposed to the sunlight he would
turn into a huge lion
despite this the couple still lived
happily together inside the castle
one day Zelda received an invitation to
her father's birthday party at home
Zelda felt homesick she wanted to go
back to visit her father and sister but
she did not want to leave basil alone
basil came to her and asked why do you
look so sad my dear my father's holding
a birthday party at home I want to see
him and my sister can you please come
with me and meet my family
oh I would like to but as you know if I
go out I will turn into a lion I will
scare your father and sister also with
the light of a flame is exposed to me I
will turn into an eagle and fly away
somewhere that I do not know just come
with me darling I promise I will not let
any light shine on him okay listening to
his wife Prince basil agreed to go with
her but the couple went to Zelda's house
in a horse's carriage Zelda rode the
horse outside while basil was sitting
inside the carriage so that the sunlight
could not reach him her father and
sister Ariel were very happy to see
Zelda again that may not Selda was eaten
by the lion she introduced basil to her
father and sister but she did not tell
them that basil was the lion her father
and Ariel were very happy that Zelda
escaped from the lion and even found a
good husband
Zelda carefully blew out all the flames
and the lights in her room
basil had to stay in Zelda's room all
day and never went out the room was
always dark and there was no light at
all the father's birthday party was
celebrated very solemnly in the house
however basil didn't attend he still
hidden the room because he feared candle
light where is basil why is he not
attending my party
dear father he's still tired after a
long trip so he's resting in the room
Ariel was very curious to find her
brother-in-law staying in the room for
the whole day she left the party and
took a candle to go to Zelda's room to
invite him to the party when Ariel
entered the room with the candle prince
basil immediately turned into an eagle
it flapped its wings to break the window
and flew away
Zelda rushed over and was very shocked
to see her husband turn into an eagle
and fly away the thing that I feared the
most happen he has turned into an eagle
and flown away
Zelda told her sister the story of how
basil was cursed
after listening Arielle felt regret and
worried about basil how can I possibly
find him now if you want to save him
then listen to my advice
Zelda was surprised to see her
Nightingale talking she asked it you
know how to save him
you just follow him to the end of the
world you will reach a flower forest
where you can find the prince and he'll
turn into a human but the way is
dangerous
just bring me with you I'll help you on
the way Zelda quickly took the
nightingale with her and set out to
rescue basil
[Music]
her father and sister were very worried
about her and her husband
Zelda bravely carried the nightingale on
her shoulder and coped with many
obstacles on the way she weight reduced
forests through high mountains and fast
flowing streams Zelda and the
nightingale kept going continuously
every day at night
only when she became exhausted she
stopped and rested for a bit on the
rocks in the forest then continued on
her way despite rain or shine or snow
she still tried to continue on with her
faithful nightingale the time flew by
and after a year had passed Zelda
finally found at the end of the world
Zelda was stunned by the beauty of the
flower forest she walked slowly in the
forest looking around to find the eagle
her husband Zelda discovered some huge
eagle feathers she happily followed the
trace to find her husband
Zelda finally found the eagle on the
grass in front of her however next to
her husband was a beautiful and evil
[ __ ] named Ella Ella swung the magic
wand in her hand to erase the Eagles
memory so he couldn't remember Zelda
anymore basil now only cared about Ella
he carried Ella and flew away
she sat down on the grass and sod if you
want to save prince basil just follow
the eagle's direction you'll find your
way to the witch Ella's castle I'll give
you these two boxes open them whenever
you need help I'll come back to you
remember this good luck the nightingale
eat zelda two shining magic boxes and
flew into the sky
Zelda wave goodbye to the bird and felt
determined to save bazel by all means I
[Music]
will find you and save you I assure you
Zelda followed the directions that were
given to her by the bird she finally
found which Ella's castle the castle was
beautifully decorated to prepare for
Prince basil and the witch Ella's
wedding Zelda was hurt she wondered why
basil after returning to a human could
forget her how could he possibly forget
me he must have been under a spell by
that evil witch Ella no no I have to go
and find him and ask him in person if he
rejects me I will give him and Ella my
blessings but if he is under Ella's
spell I will have to save him Zelda
opened the first box suddenly a really
beautiful wedding dress shining brightly
appeared in front of her she happily put
it on and confidently entered the castle
when Ellis's Elda and a gorgeous wedding
dress coming in she wanted it she
stopped Zelda and asked to buy the dress
from her hey miss I really like your
wedding dress please sell it to me I
will give you a lot of jewels and gold
for it
I don't need gold or jewels I will sell
it if you let me stay one night in the
groom's room yes I agree tonight you can
stay in his room that night Ellen
brought a glass of wine and told the
maid to make sure basil drank all of it
the maid listen to her and basil fell
asleep soundly after drinking at
midnight Zelda was allowed to enter the
room
she went to Basil's bed and sat next to
him for one year I have been searching
for you thanks to our magic night in
deal I have finally found you here but
you completely forgot about me or are
you just under the evil witch's spell
Prince basil was still fast asleep on
the bed and he couldn't hear what Zelda
said she felt very sad and cried o
nights when the morning came Zelda had
to go out and give Ella her wedding
dress Ella was very happy to receive her
beautiful wedding dress without paying
anything for it
in comparison Zelda looked very
miserable walking out of the castle she
was very sad because basil could not
hear her words she suddenly remembered
the second box that the nightingale gave
her Zelda opened the box surprisingly a
beautiful diamond ring appeared right in
front of her
Zelda put the ring on her finger the
ring shone brightly
she regained her confidence and entered
the castle again again Ella saw zelda
wearing a beautiful diamond ring so she
stopped zelda and asked to buy it
hey miss I really love the ring you are
wearing sell it to me and I will pay you
a lot of trees and gold
I don't need jewels or gold I'll only
sell it if I can spend another night in
the groom's room yes I agree tonight you
can stay in his room again that night
Ella brought a glass of wine again and
told the servant to let basil drink all
of it the servant obeyed her she took
the glass to bring it to basil basil was
surprised and tried to remember what had
happened yesterday hmm that's strange I
remember yesterday after I finished the
wine I had a headache and I couldn't
remember a theme something wrong with
the wine going to get me a cup of water
when the servant left the room
basil poured the glass of wine away and
laid down in the bed and pretended to be
fast asleep the servants saw that and
quietly went out at midnight Zelda was
allowed to enter the room
she went to Basil's bed again and sat
beside him
for one year I have been searching for
you thanks to our magic nitin deal I
have finally found you here but you
completely forgot about me or are you
just under the evil witch's spell Basel
heard Zelda's confession and his memory
was recovered he happily sat up and held
her hands Zelda
it's you my dear lovely wife I was under
a spell from that witch Ella but now I
remember everything
Zelda and basil held hands and fled away
suddenly the witch Ella appeared right
behind them with a puff of smoke Ella
swung her wand towards basil and Zelda
the beams of light shot out from the
wand the light exploded right behind
basil and Zelda making them really scary
suddenly there Nightingale appeared
which had now transformed into a giant
bird when you're down in front of basil
and Zelda it's so nightingale
hurry and jump on its back basil and
Zelda quickly jumped onto the birds back
it flapped its wings to fly away Ella
was really angry but she couldn't do
anything the nightingale brought basil
and Zelda back to their Palace in the
forest basil and Zelda were very
thankful to the faithful bird the night
L returned to its small form and flew to
Zelda's shoulder basil and Zelda's
wedding was solemnly held in the palace
under the blessing of Zelda's father and
sister
they lived happily together for the rest
of their life in the palace
[Music]
